text: This was hands down the best experience I’ve ever had purchasing a vehicle. I would recommend  CarMax to anyone, especially the Mobile location.

name: Justin Tancig
text: They helped put me into a great new car even though we had a run in on a precious car. No one held any grudges and we both came out happy. I've sold them many cars as well. They consistently give me a good price compared to other dealerships and everyone is helpful. Great place to do business with.

name: Loui-V Penn
text: Love my car, Chyna was everything! It was the quickest, easiest and painless buy I have ever been through. Would definitely continue recommending them over anyone!

name: Lori Laurendine
text: I trust making a purchase from CarMax and I appreciate the ability to choose a car from their entire inventory.  The Mobile location was easy to get to, clean, and everyone was friendly and helpful.  I love my Lincoln!

name: Hillarie Jones
text: Never ever would do business here. I was told they could help me after getting dropped off. After 50minutes of wasting my time they asked for almost $2000 down payment and had me walking down the service road. So really just lied to me trying to make a sale. Never would I use this place for anything

resp.text: Hey, Hillarie! Thank you for checking us out during your search for a vehicle. We aim to provide an easy shopping experience with upfront, no-haggle pricing. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share this feedback, and are here to help with any questions or concerns you have. We encourage you to connect with us at 800-519-1511, or by email at socialcare@carmax.com so we can ensure you have the information you need. Thank you so much! – Your Customer Care Team

name: Mesha Richardson
text: I absolutely love Mobile Carmax!!! They sold me my 2016 Hyundai Sonata and I'm in love. My favorite employee is Ms. Tchana who sold me my car. She was patient, knowledgeable and above all kind. Ask for her when you go in!!! I also was assisted in the service department by Mr. Donta and Mr. Scott, who were some of the best automotive technicians I have ever met. They were patient and kind as well. I completely stand behind my choice of 5 stars thanks to these 3 individuals.

name: Phillip Kendrick
text:
Easiest place in the world to buy a car.  Honest and helpful sales crew.
No pressure or tricks. Usually, when I speak with a car sales person, I feel like I need to go home and take a shower.

name: Jennifer Jennifer
text: Rasheed was amazing to work with while purchasing my Rav4! I had my 2 year old with me and he was happy to have her along.  Never made me feel rushed or pressured. He had all the answers and helped keep things relaxed during the test drive and purchasing process. Very fun and cool guy! 5 stars!

name: QUAWON BATTISTE
text: Had the WORST experience with Carmax of Mobile. I arrived to purchase the car the applied for financing on and brought what was expected of me. The transaction came to a STOP in the middle when they asked me for documents I was expected to bring. After days spent trying to obtain them the car was sold/transferred. I had to find another car which needed to be transferred, I was told it would take 2-3 weeks but it would most likely arrive sooner, NOPE. Took the entire 3 weeks. The only reason I stuck it out was I got a SWEET offer for financing to begin with. The car finally arrived and what happen THE FINANCE NUMBERS INCREASED DRAMATICALLY!. I HAVE NO CAR. CARMAX SUCKS!

resp.text: Hey, Quawon! Thank you for sharing this with us, the experience you've had sounds very frustrating and not at all what we’re known for. We strive to make every interaction a positive and seamless one for our customers, so we'd like to look into how we can best assist. If you'd like to further discuss your experience, please email us at socialcare@carmax.com with additional details, and we can get started. Thank you so much! – Your Customer Care Team

name: Brandy Hicks
text: Wonderful place to get a good car and warranty along with it. Great customer service 👍

name: Misty Bowen
text: I so enjoy going to Carmax, no pressure at all, no under-handed sales talk, meeting with managers, trying to talk you into leasing. Just look at the car if you like it buy it at the upfront price. Just pleasant all the way around.  May I never have to set foot in a pressure car sales place again!

name: Monica Nelson
text: Very dissatisfied customer. A large piece paint came off the top of my car roof. It’s continuously peeling. I came to the mobile office, of course they were gonna deny they had anything to do with it. I brought two vehicles from here.  I was possibly gonna buy a third one. I’ll rather go to new car dealers where the warranty fully covers it.

resp.text: Good Afternoon Monica!We're grateful that you've taken the time to provide a review for us here. We appreciate your business and are disappointed to hear that you’re frustrated with the maintenance needed on your vehicle. Our intention is to be transparent with information, and we'll be happy to help with any questions you have by email (socialcare@carmax.com) or phone (800-519-1511). Thank you. – Your Customer Care Team

name: lee bergeron
text:
It was very hard to get your sales person on the phone, or anyone for that matter. They didn't call back. I had to keep calling or emailing them.
Other than that it was good I guess
E.B.

name: Brandy Hicks
text: Wonderful place to get a good car and warranty along with it. Great customer service 👍

name: Ulanda Chambers
text: I thank God for a awesome experience I had with car max with all my picky ways John Peoples, Jones,Resheed,Tchana,all  was awesome customer service in my experience they went far and beyond for me to be happy, thanks car max

name: Bridgette Whiting
text: CarMax takes the confusion and pressure you get from a regular car dealership completely out of the buying process.  I was able to get a car I was interested in transferred from the Orlando, Fl. Carmax to the Mobile, Al. CarMax with no issues and no requirement to purchase it. The car came in and was available for me to test drive and I was able to go back and look at the car and test drive again as much as I wanted until I made my final decision. They held the car in my name for a week while I decided. All of the employees at Carmax are friendly and helpful and provide you with any information they have about the car you are interested in so that you feel confident in your purchase. Their 7 day money back no questions asked return policy and their 90 day limited warranty also gives the peace of mind a customer needs, knowing issues can be resolved if there are any. I loved my experience and highly recommend the Mobile, Alabama store as well as Bobby Roberts who was my customer specialist. In my opinion, CarMax knows how to treat customers and understands the value in up front pricing without shady tactics like other dealerships use.  It’s the right way to do business. I highly recommend them for your next car shopping experience. You’ll be pleasantly surprised. 😊

name: Rose T
text: The process was quick and easy. They gave me more than I expected for my car. They said they don't negotiate, so be prepared to take it or leave it, but I was very happy. I recommend CarMax.

name: Amee Adcock
text: We had the best car buying experience! My  fiance and I went with the intention of getting my car appraised and possibly selling it and ended up selling both of ours and buying a new one. We were there for about 8 hours (due to our lack of preparation and the fact that we were completing 3 different processes). The staff and management were fantastic. Multiple people worked with us, and everyone was very friendly and helpful. We had our baby with us and even one lady helped stroll her around since she was fussy while we signed papers. I HIGHLY recommend using this location and company.

name: Ed Moore
text: Best experience buying a car - bar none!  Womack, our salesman, was easy going and no-pressure!  We first saw the car online and by placing a hold online; they were willing to hold the car for 7 days until we could test drive it, also took it off their website, and once we saw it - we bought it!  Great selection of late model vehicles! Along with a 7 day - no questions asked - full return policy, this car shopping experience was actually enjoyable!

name: Richard Franklin
text: The whole process was smooth and seamless. I've sold two cars to CarMax and both experiences were handled very professionally.

name: Damireka Blakely
text: My experience at CarMax was great! From moment I walked in the door to the moment I walked out I was assisted! All the facts was together, I was able to test drive my car soon as I got there! There were no mistakes and process took maybe an hour at the most!

name: Taylor Washington
text: I had a great experience finding my car and the guy Michael was very nice but the process was a little of a hassle for me. It seemed like they would tell me to bring something then when I get down there I would need something else or I had to print it off in the office. My car had to be transferred in and it came in on like a Friday I think and it was like a little over a week before I actually got the drive my car off the lot due to bring in paperwork and I would bring in what they tell me but they would need more or they couldn’t accept it but overall the experience was great but the process is a bummer.

name: Bille Miller
text:
No nonsense, no haggle, easy pricing and absolutely no pressure sales. These salespeople don't work for commission and truly help you get into the car you want, not the car they want you to get.
Tim and Bobby are my heroes.

name: Monique Nolan
text: Mobile Location...no one is on the same page, communication is frequent but not consistent. You can never speak to the same person and get answers, team work is understood but does it provide personal customer service? Buying a car should not be treated as a drive thru. Call and have to speak to 3-4 different people to get the right area. Keeping your fingers crossed that you will actually get an answer. Purchasing process has too many people involved from start to finish. Customer is told "no problem" then you arrive and it's a problem.  Very frustrating, to have questions and no concrete information. Purchased a car less than 35 days ago..car has been in for repair 3 times, in 34 days, NOT GOOD! Same reoccurring problem, no answers as to WHY IS THIS HAPPENING and what will finally FIX IT FOR GOOD! Unhappy customer.

resp.text: Hi there, thanks for leaving a review for us. We’d like a chance to learn how we can turn your experience around. If you'd like to connect further, we encourage you to email us at socialcare@carmax.com, so we can best assist with any questions or concerns. Thank you. – Your Customer Care Team

name: Joanna Graves
text: We bought a car with the impression it had a 3rd row.  We mentioned this was very important.  We took it home to find what appeared to be a 3rd row let down was not

name: Willie Davis
text: Seamless experience,  tchana was very nice and professional 😁

name: Ginny Phillips Allen
text:
BREATH OF FRESH AIR: After a bad experience with 4 other dealers,
1) blaming the road for rough ride,
2)saying they fixed vibration and calling me back to drive it with the very same issue,
3) lying to me about monthly payment being within a dollar amount in my budget and then offering $125 above that AMT and coming back with a 3 no. longer term to get a lower payment, which was still above my firmly stated limit, and
4) the communications issues at a dealership which sold the car I had on hold
...Car Max Mobile, AL was a breath of fresh air. Thanks to Solomon and Erin who were professional and expedited a process that was time-consuming and laborious. I recommend CarMax, particularly CarMax Mobile, AL!  I am grateful to you for getting me in the car I wanted!

name: Ziggy Zane
text:
I didn't purchase a vehicle as I was simply checking models and prices to compare at other places and am not yet ready to buy.

However, I liked it that I could walk around the lot and not be bothered. I was allowed to walk around and check out the vehicles that interested me for 30 to 45 minutes and nobody came out trying to sell me a car. I appreciate that.

This means that I cannot rate the employee interaction though, which I'm fine with because I like being able to look around on my own.

name: Ryder 21
text: There great if you want to wait ever to get attention 😉💩

name: Jacqueline E
text: Fast, efficient, friendly, helpful.  Best car buying experience.

name: ELIJAH SANDERS
text: Not the car lot I thought it was

resp.text: Hello Elijah! We’d love the chance to hear from you about what would have improved your experience. To allow us to help with any questions or concerns, please email us at socialcare@carmax.com with additional information, and we’ll be happy to connect further. We hope to hear from you soon. – Your Customer Care Team

name: Gary Boudreaux
text: Kenny was the best, I have bought many cars in my life and this was the most seamless and easy way to buy a car, In and out in 1 1/2 hours. I drove 3 hr. round trip to get a car and it was worth it for the no hassle experience.

name: Katherine Seaman
text: Best car buying experience ever! Employees were very friendly and helpful. Tim and Angie were awesome. Next auto will definitely come from there in the future, either for my husband or self. Thank you CARMAX! I LOVE my new Lincoln MKZ Reserve!

name: Ziggy Zane
text:
I didn't purchase a vehicle as I was simply checking models and prices to compare at other places and am not yet ready to buy.

However, I liked it that I could walk around the lot and not be bothered. I was allowed to walk around and check out the vehicles that interested me for 30 to 45 minutes and nobody came out trying to sell me a car. I appreciate that.

This means that I cannot rate the employee interaction though, which I'm fine with because I like being able to look around on my own.

name: Gary Boudreaux
text: Kenny was the best, I have bought many cars in my life and this was the most seamless and easy way to buy a car, In and out in 1 1/2 hours. I drove 3 hr. round trip to get a car and it was worth it for the no hassle experience.

name: Michael Perrelli
text:
There was this guy named mike handling all of my work. He was incredibly patient understanding and got me in a sweet ride.

I'll be back next time I need a new set of wheels

name: Water Melon
text: A wonderful experience . Zoom, zoom, thank you carmax!

name: Chuck Lehman
text: 3rd time we sold a vehicle to carmax. Was great

name: Jen W
text: I had a wonderful first time car buying experience with Jerry and Michael! They were so patient and helpful during the whole process. They are a real asset to CarMax and represent the company well. I first enjoyed that I could place the car on hold for up to 7 days so I could have time to make it to Mobile on my off days. Once there, my car was picked up quickly and ready for my test drive. My bank unfortunately gave me some trouble regarding paperwork, despite being pre-approved. They were very understanding and patient with me throughout the process. I had leave and come back the next day to finalize everything. They assured me the vehicle would stay on hold for me and I need not worry. I came back the next afternoon and finalized everything, and got to drive away with my new vehicle. I definitely recommend CarMax and would use them for any future purchases. It truly is hassle free and no pressure. I enjoyed the fact that the sticker price and online price were truly the same and I did not have to encounter any hidden fees once I got there. I did not trade a vehicle in, so I can not comment on that process. If you are considering purchasing a vehicle, I recommend you give them a chance. Thank you again CarMax, Jerry, and Michael! You all are the best!!

name: Bryan Dwyer
text:
While Buying a car a couple of months ago, I went to their competitor and they had me test drive three Focuses in a row. Given my bad credit, I had to fill out loan applications over and over on PAPER, provide physical check stubs (what employer down physical checks anymore), and rushing it off to the finance wizard in a broom closet somewhere. I spent 8 hours there.

I walked down to Carmax and told the sales guy I wanted to buy a Focus , and we sat at the computer immediately and he pulled up the two focuses he had in the lot. He began the application on the COMPUTER right in front of me, the only writing I had to do was what personal information I didn't feel comfortable saying publicly on a notepad (which he shredded right in front of me). He turned the screen so I could see the banks responding in real time. Even with my bad credit, he gave me full transparency and had me out of there in the car I asked for in 30 minutes.  My purchase was so fast I didn't see them park my car in the garage.  I'm not doing back to the dinosaur car dealers anymore. If you find Rodney you're in good hands.

name: Kiarra Sturdivant
text: Went in today to return my car and expecting my refund to return to my debit card (which is how I did my down payment). I WAS WRONG ! They told me that I will receive a check and of course it’s being mailed to the WRONG ADDRESS. Not only that , when I talked one of the manager about their debit card policy , he had an attitude the WHOLE ENTIRE TIME!!! CARMAX OF MOBILE WILL NOT GET ANYMORE OF MY BUSINESS EVER!!!!!!!

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to share feedback about your experience, Kiarra. We’d like the chance to learn more and to see how we may be able to help. Would you mind reaching out to us at socialcare@carmax.com regarding any unaddressed questions or concerns you have? From there, we can help coordinate additional communication for you right away. Thank you so much! – Your Customer Care Team

name: Jeremy Duff
text: Great car buying experience. Got the car i wanted and a great extended warranty at a reasonable price. I'll definitely buy my next car from carmax.

name: Robert Wendling
text: They have a great selection of probably over 600 cars. But getting a little help is a challenge we had to wait about 15 to 20 minutes to get someone to show us around. They do have a lot of great looking clean vehicles.

name: jason walker
text: Came in today with intention on buying second vehicle in 8 days because we had such a good experience the time before. Everyone was very helpful but I brought my truck in to have appraised to use for down payment on new vehicle. Only issue was my truck was appraised at 10k less than KBB trade in value so i did not buy another vehicle from them today. Basically I was told that since the truck was around 100k miles that it was of no value to them and would be sent to wholesale.  Very disappointed with appraisal. 2015 F250 King Ranch in great condition.

resp.text: We appreciate you reaching out to us here. We strive for transparency with our customers during every interaction, and want to ensure you have the information you need. To allow us to assist with any unaddressed questions, please feel free to email us at socialcare@carmax.com. We'll be happy to continue speaking with you there. Thank you. – Your Customer Care Team

name: anzette bowens
text: They made the car buying process so simple..... Everything was done & verified by phone i literally only had to take in my down payment & drive off #beepbeep they even held my dream car for 7 days!

name: Tom Jones
text: Got a great new ride. A bit troublesome communicating via phone. Waiting for a call back is like waiting for the Publishers Clearing House call. All in all a good experience. Will go again for the next vehicle.

name: P Lee
text: 4 stars only because we didn't find anything and one gate was malfunctioning BUT this IS the cleanest and possibly the largest car dealership in Mobile. It has high end, sports, SUV's, low end.... something for EVERYONE. They actually have a car lot behind the main lot that is assumed not part of the selections but they have so many cars, they use that area for overflow. All vehicles are unlocked so you can sit in them to see if it fits your body before driving or bothering someone for keys and waiting! The no hassle price is already posted so you already know what price you're going to pay with possibly very little working room from there. I would shop there FIRST if I were serious about purchasing a vehicle! JMO

name: Ashley Anderson
text: Loved! Will keep going back for car needs.

name: Quinterius Thomas
text: My experience was nothing but the best! This was my first time getting a new car & I did it all by myself. First best experience ever!

name: Desmond Moore
text: Always helpful and they dont bother you until your ready. And sells what seem to be good quality cars. We are very satisfied!

name: Faye Sheffield
text: Quality with great pricing. Clean vehicles!

name: Aimee Barresi
text: This is the first time I bought a vehicle completely on my own and I am so disappointed in Car Max and my saleswoman Angie. I thought it would be great as a single female to buy a auto from another female. I was WRONG. I was lied to, I was promised a key to my 25,000 vehicle and I never got it. The sales manager was rude and ugly and unprofessional. I had to go back to Mercedes Benz in Mississippi to get my key. Who sells a car without giving you the key? Angie just avoided my calls and made EMPTY PROMISES to follow up, etc. Please don’t buy a car from these people. It’s such a stressful purchase and buying from car max is even more stressful. I literally felt my blood boiling. Save yourself the aggravation.

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to leave a review here, Aimee, and for giving us an opportunity to earn your business. We’ve shared this feedback with our local management team, and we're eager to connect further about your key concern. It's our understanding that one of our Mobile managers recently left a voicemail for you. If you haven't already had a chance to do so, we encourage you to return that call ((251) 439-6699) so we can best assist. Thank you. – Your Customer Care Team

name: Sebastian Santiago
text:
Bought a great car, in great shape for a great price. Sales team were professional and straight to the point. Really enjoyed not having the classic salesmen pitches you get in dealerships.
I was in an out in an hour or so. I'm glad they finally came to Mobile !

name: David Gleason (TsumetaiFukushu)
text: I came in with an elderly friend looking to replace his car after someone rear-ended him.  The two gentlemen at Daphne CarMax helped him find a car, no pressure sales, fixed the one problem on the car and put new tires on.  Then, because his wife didn't drive, they delivered the new car to his house.  Great customer service, you just don't get people like that anymore.

name: Joseph Mangin
text: I would never buy another used car again without trying Carmax first. ZERO SALES PRESSURE. GREAT VALUES. I BOUGHT A BEAUTIFUL USED PICK UP. SEVERAL YEARS OLD, LOOKS AND DRIVES LIKE BRAND NEW.

name: Sara Hildebrand
text: Chyna was awesome to deal with. No high pressure sales there.

name: Trevor Bingham
text: Great prices for vehicles. Staff was very friendly, but seemed pretty unorganized. I made an appointment and the sales associate didn't arrive to work until an hour later, then he messed up my paperwork. I had already picked out the vehicle and was sure I was going to purchase it, and it still took 4 1/2 hours to get in and out of there. But, in the end, I got a great vehicle for a great price.

name: Daniel Buckner
text: angie was so awesome. she went above and beyond in trying to help me get the vehicle. there was an issue with the paper work that took forever to resolve and she stuck with it until after the place had closed to make sure i got what i needed.  other salespeople i’ve worked with would have asked me to come back the next day. thank you miss angie!

name: George Martin
text: Very easy to sell our car and quickly too!

name: Terrell Durham
text: Great customer service...made sure that I left with car

name: C. Rod
text:
I enjoyed my experience at Carmax. My sell lady was Courtney Young. She was Honest, Professional, well educated. Courtney's team mates were awesome as well. I honesty can't think of any thing negative.

Thank you Courtney!

name: Jerome Hines
text: Upon arrival, an hour early for my appointment, the person I checked in with did not check me in. After 2 hours of waiting we were finally helped and purchased the vehicle. Not a good experience at all from beginning to end.

resp.text: Hello Jerome, we appreciate you posting a review for our store. The experience you shared sounds very frustrating and not at all what we’re known for. We aim to deliver an exceptional experience that is hassle-free for you as our customer, so we'll absolutely take your feedback to heart. We're grateful that you provided us with these details so we can explore how to continue improving our service in the future. - Your Customer Care Team

name: Glenn Johnson
text: Disorganized, dishonest, incompetent staff.  I had my car delivered there in my absence.  CarMax rep performing the appraisal said it would not crank and could not be jumped.  Appraisal value was therefore very low ($500) because they could not ascertain the mileage.  I went there and cranked it myself with no issues.  CarMax rep acted surprised and said she did not know that the key had to be inserted in order to crank it (true).  She then recorded mileage and told me car would be re-appraised and they would contact me with new number.  Four days later, still no contact from CarMax.  I call them to find out that the verbiage in the original offer had been revised to say that the car would in fact run but that the odometer was suddenly non functional (not true).  The offer remained at $500.

resp.text: We appreciate you allowing us the opportunity to appraise your vehicle, Glenn. Our Mobile team certainly never hopes to hear that our offer was lower than what our customer was hoping for, and we always aim to be transparent when it comes to our appraisal process. After discussing your review with our Mobile management team, we understand that they had the chance to review our offer with our purchasing team and assist in answering your questions, as the vehicle was appraised correctly for the condition. We certainly encourage you to touch base with our Mobile team with any additional questions or e-mail us at socialcare@carmax.com if we can help facilitate a call from our Mobile management team. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. – Your Customer Care Team

name: Beatriz Jimenez
text: Great variety of cars. However, many have very high mileage and are very pricey.

name: Eric Williams
text: Great people and the exclusive warranty they have on their automobiles are the best thing since slice bread!!

text: As Always, great people, great service! Nick is the best serviceman there!

name: Kyle Davis
text: By far the best car buying experience I have ever had top notch service

name: Justin Dougherty
text:
Update from January 3rd 2018. We decided to give this place another shot because of the great things we heard from friends and family. Overall we had a great experience and we would recommend coming here if you’re interested in a very low stress car buying or selling experience.

(Original review, one star) We made an appointment over the phone to have our car appraised for 2pm of the same day (we called around noon). We showed up at 1:50 and checked in at the front desk and didn’t see our name on the appointment board but they said they still had our appointment in the system and to take a seat and someone would be with us shortly. After 40 minutes of waiting we started to try to find someone and see if they forgot about us. We spent a few moments trying to find an employee to help us but after we couldn’t find one right away we left out of frustration with our experience there. It’s a very clean and nice facility and we saw a few other people being helped so I’m sure not every experience here is bad. But, we waited for 40 minutes and no employee said anything to us after the check in so my experience certainly makes this place deserving of a one star review.

name: Stephanie Gage
text: Very intelligent place day will help you for the best

name: Shelia Collier
text: Such an easy and outstanding car buying experience for those of us with busy schedules.

text: My experience with CarMax was UNBELIEVABLY EASY! In about an hour and a half I was signing papers for a 2014 Kia Forte! I walked in without an appointment and I was very impressed on how fast they got me approved! I have been to other places before Carmax and unfortunately had the run around. I will say I regret not trying Carmax first. I was also impressed with Angela (my sales rep) and how professional she was ! She was very attentive to my needs. I just wanted to send a quick THANK YOU again for all your help ! I am a very pleased customer and I will be sending people I know to Carmax. DON'T GO ANYWHERE ELSE! :D

name: Shawana Gibson
text: Horrible! Staff very disorganized and has very little knowledge of the vehicles that they are trying to sell. They undervalued my trade in and tried to tell me that my previous loan company told them a higher payoff than they had given me earlier that morning (had to call my loan company on a three way call and she flat out called them a lie on the phone before they would agree that my payoff was the amount I had told them). I originally picked out a car online that I was preapproved for but once I got to the lot I became more interested in others each time my credit was ran again (even though I was assured it was not being ran additional times). Even though the vehicles were less than the 25K I was approved for my APR went up each time. The third time I was told that I would need an additional 1600 down payment even though that would not decrease my car payment. Oh and to top it off my salesman started flirting with my sister as soon as we walked in the door (aggravated her so bad that she just sat outside in the hot car until i was ready to leave)openly expressed how he "originally applied to work in the back but since the back was fully staffed he just took the sales job to get his foot in the door, because in the back they make more money. figured this would be a good place since its new to the area boy was I wrong.

resp.text: We appreciate you giving us the opportunity to earn your business, Shawna. name: Christopher Oconnor
text:
This is the worst way I have been treated as a customer from ANY business from as long as i can remember. If you want to feel like a valued customer and not be treated like a thief and have your integrity attacked, I strongly advise you t spend your money elsewhere. There are plenty of other car washes in Tuscaloosa. If this is the last car wash left on earth i think its best to never wash your car again than to deal with these people.  Let me explain...

I purchased the daily unlimited plan from Overflow during summer 2020. I dont really wash my car so often but with the pandemic i did not want to keep using my card in the machine or dealing with workers. A staff member came out and put a sticker in my car. He did not do a very good job at placing the sticker and it was not flush on the windscreen. I did not think this was a big deal since if it was then i would think the employee would replace it with a new sticker there and then.

Fast forward a few weeks later and thats when pestering from the Overflow workers began. One specific female worker kept accusing me of removing the sticker from my car. I tried to explain that the sticker has never touched since the day it was put on and she refused to believe me. I told her to change the sticker to a proper one, but she didnt.

Recently, in the last days of September 2020, a new person started pestering me and that gentleman told me he was the owner.  He told me that "5000" vehicles have stickers from his company and none looks like mine so i must have taken it off to give my friends. Basically, he was questioning my integrity and accusing me of being a thief. I am a PhD student and instructor at UA, and so as an upcoming researcher integrity is super important to me and i got annoyed with the constant questioning of my integrity. I have never been accused of stealing anything in my life so i was very upset over this. I would never compromise my integrity, especially in the way they are accusing me.

The owner now told me that he could finally change the sticker or give me a refund and cancel my membership; I told him to change the sticker. When he came out with a new sticker he told me that if the new sticker starts to look crumpled after he puts it on then that means i am tampering with it and he would cancel my plan instantly. This then sounds to me like a set up. Clearly he still believes that i am tampering with the sticker and is setting me up to prove him right if the sticker looks misaligned in some way in the future. Anything can happen in the future; a pet or some object could come in contact with the sticker and make it misaligned in the future, and while that probability is very low it is non-zero. I did not want to give these people any opportunity to disparage my integrity further so thats when i told the owner i changed my mind and told him to give me a refund. He went to do it like it was nothing, like i was never a valued customer in the first place. Like i was begging this company for their services and not paying my hard earned money for it. No-one has ever touched that sticker, so their accusations and lack of reconciliation is sad.

text: Clean fast and friendly

name: Justen Wood
text: Purchased an unlimited wash plan with tire shine and rain x  2 months ago. Since doing so, maybe 6/10 times I got the tire shine and maybe 3/10 got the rain x. At least every other time I have come, I have been told that the equipment is malfunctioning or down and I cannot wash my car. Also, they only play Christian worship music around the clock. Not just Christian rock or pop, actual worship songs like you’re in church confessing your sins. Doesn’t help that the employees harass you the entire time and literally won’t let you press any buttons on the self serve screen when trying to select the kind of wash you want. I have never done a review of a business before but it’s only because I’ve never had a bad enough experience to do so until now.

resp.text: Mr.  Wood:  We are very sorry that you are not pleased with your experiences at Overflow Express Wash.  We work really hard at trying to please everybody.  I have searched our customer data base and do not see your name.  Is your unlimited wash plan under a different name?  We would like to do what we can to resolve your displeasure.

resp.text: Bryan, did you speak with an attendant about your dissatisfaction?  I’m wondering if something went wrong with the controls/chemicals when you came through the wash. I can assure you we spend lots and lots of $$ on chemicals and soaps. We want a chance to make you satisfied. Please contact us at overflowexpresswash@gmail.com and provide more details. Thanks so much for taking time to provide feed back.

resp.text: ☀️☀️ - Thanks, Claude!

name: Courtney Grammer
text: I came to Overflow for the first time yesterday. It was very clean and new. The employee who helped me was extremely caring and professional. Steven was kind, funny, helpful, and not pushy. The carwash was a fun experience! Our van looks great. The lights inside the wash are a blast to see. It's like going through the tunnel on Willy Wonka. My kids and I loved it! The music was uplifting and the vacuums were the best I've ever used anywhere. Be careful, they are POWERFUL!!! They even have air guns to blow out any water or soap left in the crevices of your car. My car smelled great after the carwash! We will definitely be back. I tried the $15 wash, but I will get the monthly membership on my next visit. I wanted to try it out first. Im a very happy customer!

resp.text: We love “very happy customers.”  That is what we work hard to earn every single day.  We look forward to having you as an unlimited wash club member. You may join our unlimited wash club online at www.overflowexpresswash.com or visit our wash and we will get you signed up. Thanks for your business!
